title: One Red Dot: A Pop-Up Book for Children of All Ages
description: A Classic Collectible Pop-UpOne Red Dot is a stunning tour de force from David A. Carter, the creator of the bestselling Bugs in a Box® books.Each of the ten magnificent pop-up sculptures challenges readers to find the one red dot. From the flip-flop flaps to the whimsical wiggle-wobble widgets, each page is an original piece of artwork to cherish and admire.
author: David A. Carter
